Plot: Amelia Peabody inherited two things from her father: a considerable fortune and an unbendable will. The first allowed her to indulge in her life's passion. Without the second, the mummy's curse would have made corpses of them all.
Characters: Abdullah ibn Hassan al Wahhab, Evelyn Barton-Forbes, Radcliffe Emerson, Walter Emerson, Amelia Peabody
